About

Ralley Cap (Teeball)

For players born in and between and .

  • Girls & Boys (no travel)

  • Mondays and Wednesdays 5:30-6:30pm

  • Equipment Required:

    • CSA Approved Helmet
    • Baseball Glove
    • Bat
    • Shoes

Register - Fee $70

Rookie Baseball

For players born in and .

  • Runs end of April / first week of May to the end of June (travel to Davisburg, High River, Nanton, Millarville)

  • Tuesdays and Thursdays 6:30-8:00pm

  • 5 innings

  • Equipment Required:

    • Ball Glove
    • CSA approved Helmet
    • Bat
    • Jack/Jill Protective Gear
    • Gray Ball Pants (recommended)

Register - Fee $80

Mosquito Baseball

For players born in and .

  • Runs end of April / first week of May to the end of June (travel to Davisburg, High River, Nanton, Millarville)

  • Mondays and Wednesdays 6:00-8:00pm; Practices on Saturday 9:00-11:00pm

  • 6 innings

  • Equipment Required:

    • Ball Glove
    • Bat
    • Gray Ball Pants
    • Jack/Jill Protective Gear
    • CSA approved Helmet

If we do not have enough players we may move players to join Millarville


Register - Fee $80

Peewee Baseball

For players born in and .

  • Runs end of April / first week of May to the end of June

  • Tuesdays and Thursdays; Practices Saturdays

  • 7 innings

  • Equipment Required:

    • Ball Glove
    • Bat
    • Gray Ball Pants
    • CSA approved Helmet
    • Jack/Jill Protective Gear

If we do not have enough players we may move players to join Millarville


Register - Fee $90

Bantam and Midget

For players born in and between and .
  • These are done through either Foothills Minor Baseball or Millarville Sports Association

U15 - Bantam Baseball

  • Runs end of April / first week of May to the end of June
  • Days & Time of Play - TBD - 7 innings
  • Equipment Required:
    • Ball Glove
    • Bat
    • Gray Ball Pants
    • CSA approved Helmet
    • Jack/Jill Protective Gear

U17 - Midget Baseball

  • Runs end of April / first week of May to the end of June
  • Equipment Required:
    • Ball Glove
    • Bat
    • Gray Ball Pants
    • CSA approved Helmet
    • Jack/Jill Protective Gear
